scripts.deploy-server: rm -rf dist/server && mkdir dist/server && bun run utils/server/bundler.ts && cp .env.prod.json dist/server && cp key.pem dist/server && cp cert.pem dist/server && npx env-cmd node utils/server/deploy.js
scripts.deploy-client: rm -rf dist/client && cd client && bunx ng build && cd .. && cp -r client/dist/home-hub-client dist/client && cp Dockerfile dist/client && cp captain-definition dist/client && tar --strip-components=3 -cvf ./deploy.tar --exclude='*.map' ./dist/client/* && caprover deploy -t ./deploy.tar -n legio -a home-hub-client && rm ./deploy.tar
